title: Ronaldo In a Rut
description:
The FC crew take a deep dive into Cristiano Ronaldo's scoring rut for Manchester United and whether his form suggests he's nearing the end of his career. Plus, the panel question if Arsenal should be considered favorites over Liverpool on the weekend, and Darwin Nunez makes some surprising comments on not being able to understand Jurgen Klopp.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Cristiano Ronaldo's rut for Man united continues; Arsenal favored against Liverpool; Darwin Nunez's misunderstanding of Klopp
